tweak.name: Enable show thumbnails instead of icons
Disable show window contents while dragging
Enable smooth edges of screen fonts
Disable use drop shadows for icon labels on the desktop
Disable use drop shadows for icon labels on the desktop
Always hide most used list in start menu
Disable show recently opened items in start, jump lists and file explorer
Lock all Driver DPC to one core
Enable X2Apic and enable Memory Mapping for PCI-E devices
Disable synthetic TSC tick and use accurate RTC instead
tweak.description: Disable synthetic TSC tick and use accurate RTC instead (not to be confused with useplatformclock). Enable HPET in BIOS for best results. Only for untweaked systems (TSC recommended instead on tweaked systems).

tweak.name: Set a reliable 1 ms (minimum) timestamp
tweak.description: Set a reliable 1 ms (minimum) timestamp. Only for untweaked systems (disabling it with 0 is recommended on tweaked systems).

tweak.name: Enable Kernel-Managed Memory and disable Meltdown/Spectre patches
Disallow drivers to get paged into virtual memory
Use big system memory caching to improve microstuttering
Use big pagefile to improve microstuttering

tweak.on: wmic computersystem where name="%computername%" set AutomaticManagedPagefile=False & wmic pagefileset where name="C:\\pagefile.sys" set InitialSize=32768,MaximumSize=32768
tweak.off: wmic computersystem where name="%computername%" set AutomaticManagedPagefile=True
tweak.lookup: wmic computersystem where name="%computername%" get AutomaticManagedPagefile

tweak.name: Disable DMA memory protection
tweak.description: Disable DMA memory protection and cores isolation ("virtualization-based protection").

tweak.name: Disable kernel Memory Mitigations
tweak.description: Disable some of the kernel memory mitigations. Causes boot crash/loops if Intel SGX is enforced and not set to \"Application Controlled\" or \"Off\" in your Firmware. Gamers don't use SGX under any possible circumstance.

tweak.name: Avoid uncontiguous portions of low-memory
tweak.description: Avoid the use of uncontiguous portions of low-memory from the OS. Boosts memory performance and improves microstuttering at least 80% of the cases. Also fixes the command buffer stutter after disabling 5-level paging on 10th gen Intel. Causes system freeze on unstable memory sticks.

tweak.name: Disable 57-bits 5-level paging
tweak.description: Disable 57-bits 5-level paging, also known as "Linear Address 57". Only 100% effective on 10th gen Intel. 256 TB of virtual memory per-disk is way much more than enough anyway.

tweak.on: powershell "Remove-Item -Path \"HKLM:\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows NT\CurrentVersion\Image File Execution Options\*\" -Recurse -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue"

tab.name: Services

tweak.name: Disable Windows Push Notifications User Service
Disable Windows Defender Service (use Safe Boot)
Windows Defender Advanced Threat Protection Service
Disable Connected Devices Platform User Service
Disable Connected User Experiences and Telemetry
Disable Windows Defender Firewall and BFE
Disable Secure Socket Tunneling Protocol Service

section.name: After setting IP manually ip config

tab.section:
NcbService 3 4
netprofm 3 4
BITS 3 4
cdpsvc 3 4
NlaSvc 3 4
Dhcp 2 4
WinHttpAutoProxySvc 2 4
WinHttpAutoProxySvc
iphlpsvc 2 4
Dnscache 2 4
DusmSvc 2 4

tweak.name: Decrease mouse and keyboard buffer sizes
Enable Experimental Autotuning and NEWRENO congestion provider

tweak.on: netsh int tcp set global autotuning=experimental & netsh int tcp set supp internet congestionprovider=newreno

tweak.name: Enable WH send and WH receive

tweak.on: netsh int udp set global uro=enabled
tweak.off: netsh int udp set global uro=disabled
tweak.lookup: netsh int udp show global | findstr /c:"Receive Offload State"

tweak.on: netsh int teredo set state natawareclient & netsh int 6to4 set state state=enabled
netsh advfirewall set allprofiles state off
tweak.off: netsh advfirewall set allprofiles state on
tweak.lookup: netsh advfirewall show allprofiles state | findstr /c:"State"

tweak.on: netsh advfirewall firewall set rule group="Network Discovery" new enable=No & netsh advfirewall firewall set rule group="File and Printer Sharing" new enable=No

tweak.name: Force contiguous memory allocation in the DirectX Graphics Kernel
Force contiguous memory allocation in the NVIDIA driver
(NVIDIA GPU) Stop tolerating high DPC/ISR latencies
Open Appearance and performance of Windows

tweak.on: _SetTimerResolutionService.exe -install & sc config STR start=auto & net start STR
wmic.exe /Namespace:\\root\default Path SystemRestore Call CreateRestorePoint "EzTweak restore point", 100, 7

tweak.name: Allow scripts in CMD set-executionpolicy remotesigned
Stop Tablet mode from automatically enabling in Registry
Disable enable open xbox game bar using game controller
Disable let websites show me locally relevant content by accessing my language list
Disable let windows improve start and search results by tracking app launches
Disable personal inking and typing dictionary
Disable store my activity history on this device
Disable cloud content search for work or school account
Open file explorer to this pc
Hide frequent folders in quick access

section.name: Task Scheduler (Ordered by Last Run Time)
